Source code

  1. ‌extern inline unsigned char get_fs_byte(const char * addr)
  2. {
  3.         unsigned register char _v;

  5.         __asm__ ("movb %%fs:%1,%0":"=q" (_v):"m" (*addr));
  6.         return _v;
  7. }

  9. ‌extern inline unsigned short get_fs_word(const unsigned short *addr)
  10. {
  11.         unsigned short _v;

  13.         __asm__ ("movw %%fs:%1,%0":"=q" (_v):"m" (*addr));
  14.         return _v;
  15. }

  17. ‌extern inline unsigned long get_fs_long(const unsigned long *addr)
  18. {
  19.         unsigned long _v;

  21.         __asm__ ("movl %%fs:%1,%0":"=q" (_v):"m" (*addr)); \
  22.         return _v;
  23. }

  25. ‌extern inline void put_fs_byte(char val,char *addr)
  26. {
  27. __asm__ ("movb %0,%%fs:%1"::"q" (val),"m" (*addr));
  28. }

  30. ‌extern inline void put_fs_word(short val,short * addr)
  31. {
  32. __asm__ ("movw %0,%%fs:%1"::"q" (val),"m" (*addr));
  33. }

  35. ‌extern inline void put_fs_long(unsigned long val,unsigned long * addr)
  36. {
  37. __asm__ ("movl %0,%%fs:%1"::"q" (val),"m" (*addr));
  38. }

  40. /*
  41. * Someone who knows GNU asm better than I should double check the followig.
  42. * It seems to work, but I don't know if I'm doing something subtly wrong.
  43. * --- TYT, 11/24/91
  44. * [ nothing wrong here, Linus ]
  45. */

  47. ‌extern inline unsigned long get_fs()
  48. {
  49.         unsigned short _v;
  50.         __asm__("mov %%fs,%%ax":"=a" (_v):);
  51.         return _v;
  52. }

  54. ‌extern inline unsigned long get_ds()
  55. {
  56.         unsigned short _v;
  57.         __asm__("mov %%ds,%%ax":"=a" (_v):);
  58.         return _v;
  59. }

  61. ‌extern inline void set_fs(unsigned long val)
  62. {
  63.         __asm__("mov %0,%%fs"::"a" ((unsigned short) val));
  64. }
